div.p: SAT total trend from model simulations. Decadal trends [1961–2000; °C (dec) −1] in summer SAT from CESM1 ensemble members (35). The subplot in the top left corner represents member 1 and counting forward towards right. The maps in the figure are generated using the MATLAB software (Version: R2012b (8.0.0.783) & http://www.mathworks.com/products/matlab/?s_tid=srchtitle).
